resources.string: The flu arrived and came with great force, so this game will help us to know how prevent it.
Choose Right or Wrong for the situation shown below.
You are with the flu and get in a closed enviroment with crowd people
Right Answer! \n If you are with the flu, you should avoid closed enviroment, to dont to spread the flu
Wrong Answer. \n If you are with the flu, you should avoid closed enviroment, to dont to spread the flu
